title: Alabama Judge’s Ultimatum to Offenders Who Can’t Pay Fines: Give Blood or Go to Jail
text:
Published By: Media Ite - Today 
An Alabama judge is facing an ethics complaint after he was recorded telling offenders in his courtroom that those who can't pay their fines...
